snippet: Tornadoes tore through the Dallas area on Tuesday, peeling roofs off homes and leaving flattened tractor-trailers strewn along highways and parking lots.
abstract: Tornadoes tear through the Dallas area, peeling roofs off homes and leaving flattened tractor-trailers strewn along highways and parking lots; more than a dozen injuries are reported; estimates are that 6 to 12 tornadoes touched down in North Texas.
lead_paragraph: Tornadoes tore through the Dallas area on Tuesday, peeling roofs off homes and leaving flattened tractor-trailers strewn along highways and parking lots.
